alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 6:17AM EST until December 24 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots. * WHERE...Lake Moultrie. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
